questionDescription: Which concept combines the best of data lakes and data warehouses?
questionAnswerExplanation: The Lakehouse combines low-cost storage with ACID transactions and analytics.

questionDescription: Which of the following is NOT a Databricks workspace component?
questionAnswerExplanation: Dashboards are outputs but not a core workspace component.

questionDescription: Which Databricks workspace component is used for source code version control?
questionAnswerExplanation: Repos allow Git-based collaboration inside Databricks.

questionDescription: Which type of cluster is suitable for ad-hoc analysis and notebooks?
questionAnswerExplanation: All-purpose clusters are interactive and used for analysis.

questionDescription: Which type of cluster is created for scheduled jobs and then terminates automatically?
questionAnswerExplanation: Job clusters are ephemeral and tied to one job run.

questionDescription: What does autoscaling in Databricks clusters do?
questionAnswerExplanation: Autoscaling automatically adjusts the number of worker nodes.
questionOption3: Adjusts number of workers based on load

questionDescription: Which languages are supported in Databricks notebooks?
What is the purpose of DBFS in Databricks?
questionAnswerExplanation: Databricks File System provides distributed storage for cluster access.

questionDescription: Which command mounts Azure Data Lake to Databricks?
questionAnswerExplanation: dbutils.fs.mount() is used to mount ADLS.

questionDescription: Which file formats can Databricks read and write natively?
Which API is commonly used to work with structured data in Databricks?
questionAnswerExplanation: Spark DataFrames provide structured APIs for data processing.

questionDescription: Which Spark transformation returns a new DataFrame without changing the source?
questionAnswerExplanation: Transformations like filter() and select() return new DataFrames.

correctOptionNumbers: what is the role of the Bronze layer?
questionOption1: Bronze stores raw ingested data in original format.

correctOptionNumbers: what is the Silver layer used for?
questionOption1: Silver layer stores cleaned and conformed data.

questionDescription: Which layer in the Medallion Architecture is designed for analytics and reporting?
questionOption1: business-ready data for BI and ML.
